name: react-preloader-icon
description: SVG loading icons component for React.

scripts.build-vendor: browserify -r babel-core/browser -r react -r react-dom -r velocity-animate -r core-js/fn/object/assign -r core-js/fn/promise -r detectie -o dist/browser.vendor.js
scripts.build-browser: browserify -x react -x react-dom -x velocity-animate -x core-js/fn/object/assign -x core-js/fn/promise -x detectie -s PreloaderIcon src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ]
scripts.build-watch: watchify -x react -x react-dom -x velocity-animate -x core-js/fn/object/assign -x core-js/fn/promise -x detectie -s PreloaderIcon src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ] -d -v
scripts.build: npm run build-vendor && npm run build-browser && npm run build-commonjs

author: UYEONG <uyeong21c@gmail.com> (http://blog.coderifleman.com/)
